title: Leading Health Care Provider in WA - PNW | VMFH
description: Virginia Mason Franciscan Health provides compassionate, quality health care throughout the Pacific Northwest and Puget Sound Area. Schedule an appointment today!
cleaned_text: Access your health records and reach out to your health care team when and where it's convenient for you. Not sure which option you should select? [Read more](https://www.vmfh.org/patient-and-visitor-information/patient-information/about-our-patient-portals) about our patient portals. Whether you received care in one of our clinics, hospitals or other locations, it's easy to pay your Virginia Mason Franciscan Health bill online using MyChart or Virginia Mason (VM) eStatements. Access your health records and reach out to your health care team when and where it's convenient for you. Not sure which option you should select? [Read more](https://www.vmfh.org/patient-and-visitor-information/patient-information/about-our-patient-portals) about our patient portals. Whether you received care in one of our clinics, hospitals or other locations, it's easy to pay your Virginia Mason Franciscan Health bill online using MyChart or Virginia Mason (VM) eStatements. Learn about vaccines, testing options and more information about the virus. We believe humanity and kindness are at the heart of healing. Powerful alone, but better together. They inspire what we do for patients and what we do for each other.
